casebody.data:
Tony A. Hawkins
v.
Earnest R. Sutton, Superintendent No. 387P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Tony A. Hawkins, Pro Se. Mr. Tom Horner, District Attorney, For State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 14th of October 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wilkes County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
